sentences.en: Finally Melly wiped tears of mirth from her eyes.
sentences.cn: 最后媚兰才把欢乐的眼泪拭掉,开口说话.

sentences.en: For once Dimbleby lost his composure. It was all he could do to stop tears of mirth falling down his cheeks.
sentences.cn: 这一次丁布尔比没能控制住自己的感情。他唯一能做的也就是不让欢乐的泪水流下脸庞。

sentences.en: Her body began to shake with mirth.
His mind was boiling with mirth, fear and pride.
sentences.cn: 快意 、 恐惧、自豪一起在他心头翻腾.

sentences.en: His ruddy face still routinely creases with mirth.
sentences.cn: 他红润的脸庞仍旧时常笑得堆起褶子。

sentences.en: It was all he could do to stop tears of mirth falling down his cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他能做的只有不让快乐的泪水滑落脸庞。

sentences.en: It was ever a centre of light and mirth.
sentences.cn: 这里永远是愉快和欢乐的中心.

sentences.en: Mirth is suddenly changed to sorrow.

她认为我高兴是不合时宜的.

sentences.en: That caused considerable mirth amongst pupils and sports masters alike.
sentences.cn: 那个举动引得学生和体育老师大笑不止。

sentences.en: The announcement was greeted with much hilarity and mirth.

sentences.en: The contagious mirth of the thing was repeatedly emphasised.

sentences.en: The performance produced much mirth among the audience.
sentences.cn: 这场演出使观众笑声不断。

sentences.en: There was a ripple of mirth, which the court checked.
sentences.cn: 人们一阵哄笑.法官把他们喝止住了.

sentences.en: When I told them what had happened to me, they all chortled with mirth.
sentences.cn: 我把我的事告诉他们以後, 他们咯咯地笑起来了.
